en.title: We value your privacy
en.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience on our site. Some cookies are necessary for our website and services to function properly. Other cookies are optional and help personalize your experience, including advertising and analytics. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

customization.title: Customize cookies
customization.description: Choose which types of cookies you want to allow. You can change these settings at any time.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: Necessary for basic site functionality like login, security, and accessibility. Cannot be disabled.

functionality.title: Functionality cookies
functionality.description: Allow personalization of your experience by remembering your preferences like language, theme, and learning settings.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our site to improve features and user experience.

performance.title: Performance cookies
performance.description: Optimize site performance by remembering your actions and preferences for faster loading.
